hooks.command: if [[ "$FILE" == */apps/* ]] || [[ "$FILE" == */packages/* ]]; then REPO_ROOT=$(echo "$FILE" | sed 's|/\(apps\|packages\)/.*|/|'); cd "$REPO_ROOT" && pnpm biome check --write "$FILE" 2>/dev/null || true; fi
hooks.description: Auto-format edited files in apps/* and packages/* with Biome
